name: rundeck
description: Rundeck is a self-hosted automation platform for operations and DevOps teams. It provides scheduling, orchestration, and access control for running jobs and workflows via UI or API.

features.title: Workflow Orchestration
features.description: Chain multiple commands and scripts into complex workflows

features.title: Node Management
features.description: Execute jobs across multiple servers from a central interface

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Define who can run, view, or modify jobs using role-based permissions

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Create and manage jobs through an intuitive browser-based interface

features.title: REST API
features.description: Trigger jobs and retrieve results programmatically via REST API

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send alerts to Slack, email, or webhooks when jobs complete or fail
